item.description:
OK, So louise had us wanting to fly Saturday morning. But Mother Nature had other plans for us that didnt include flying. So, its New Year's Eve! Lets see who has the day off for a flight this morning. Leave early so we can be back early. And don't forget to wish the controllers a Happy New Year! Not sure where yet. I'm guessing somewhere on this side of the equator.... Could be close, could be far. Kinda depends on time frame. Let me know if anyone wants to join me on a breakfast flight to somewhere (Barnes? Sanford? I'm open to suggestions).  This may be the last flight of 2012!

(thanks to Charley for the title of this flyout)

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Somewhere Over the Rainbow...Take Three!
